description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Tanzania vs Burkina Faso in the Friendlies
title: Tanzania vs Burkina Faso: Friendlies stats & head-to-head
title_page: Tanzania vs Burkina Faso: Friendlies stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Goal!
Goal! Tanzania 0, Burkina Faso 2. Clément Pitroipa (Burkina Faso) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Ridouanou Maïga.
Booking
Abdoul Baguian (Burkina Faso) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Goal!
Goal! Tanzania 0, Burkina Faso 1. Abdoul Baguian (Burkina Faso) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal.
Booking
Abdoul Abass Guiro (Burkina Faso) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
